>
[Orc Weapon Carnage](/Feats.aspx?ID=87) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=86)

</column>

---

You are brutally efficient with the weapons of your orc ancestors. Whenever you critically hit using a [falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), a [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), or an [orc](/Traits.aspx?ID=124) weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
